input_text:
Job Title: Writer and Content Lead

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Type is building a document editor for the AI era.
We are hiring a full-time professional writer who cares deeply about the craft of writing and has a knack for marketing.
You'll join our small team in-person in Brooklyn and have ownership in a fast-growing AI startup backed by top VCs.
If the description below sounds like you, please reach out.
Does this sound like you?
We're looking for someone who's obsessed with writing and communication.
Maybe this sounds like you:Do you find yourself mentally editing text on billboards, subway ads, and instruction manuals?Have you ever missed your subway stop or let a pot boil over because you were too engrossed in proofreading an article on your phone?Is writing a compulsion for you?Do you jot down great phrases you come across?Do you relish the challenge of fitting a complex idea into a tweet without losing its essence?Do you appreciate the brilliance of a great Super Bowl ad or SNL skit?Are you the go-to person for friends and family when they need help wording an email?Are you fascinated by other people? If there's an interesting conversation happening next to you at a restaurant or coffee shop, do you eavesdrop?Do you like people? Is some of your best writing downstream from lively conversations you've had?Are you intensely curious? When Google fails you, will you cold email someone? Have you ever gone to a library to dig up an obscure book or document without being asked?Do you know when words aren't enough? Do you instinctively reach to other mediums – images, graphs, memes, videos – in service of best communicating an idea?
If you found yourself nodding along to most of these, please read on.
Content is the key to driving AI adoption
As Type's Writer and Content Lead, you will play a crucial role in educating users about how Type can transform their writing process.
You'll create content that demonstrates the capabilities of Type's AI-driven features, such as:Type Chat for ideation and brainstormingIn-doc features like "Generate Draft" for writing high-substance first draftsThe command palette for summoning powerful writing commands at the cursor
You'll take lead on our core content efforts:Publishing thoughtful blog and landing page contentWriting educational onboarding emailsCrafting and distributing major announcementsProducing video tutorials
We're building an AI-powered document editor for writers like you, so you need to be able to get super passionate about our product, artificial intelligence, and writing. You'll be helping to educate the world about all three.
You'll also be responsible for distributing this content effectively to maximize its reach and engagement with our target audience. When we have an announcement to make, for example, you should think hard about how we can maximize its reach.
We are a small, passionate team backed by top VCs
Right now, we're a team of three based in Brooklyn, backed by Y Combinator and other top Silicon Valley VCs and angels.
We are building a document editor designed for the AI era. You can read more about our product and vision here.
As our first content hire, you'll have the opportunity to shape our content strategy from the ground up and make a significant impact on the future of writing.
ResponsibilitiesA sample of things you might work on:Writing thoughtful blog posts, tutorials, and product updates. For example, you might write a post comparing the relative writing strengths and weaknesses between the latest Gemini model and Claude 3.Creating and managing email campaigns, mostly onboarding sequences that educate new usersScripting, producing, and editing videos that showcase Type's featuresAnalyzing content performance and using data to help inform where to invest our time next
What we're looking for in you6+ years of experience in content marketing, writing, or a related fieldStrong writing and editing skills, with a knack for explaining complex topics clearlyProven ability to create content that drives traffic, engagement, and conversionsA bend towards writing things that are pragmatic and helpfulExperience with SEO, email marketing, and video production best practices (you don't need to be a pro at video production, but you should feel comfortable with it)Experience using publishing and website building tools like Webflow – ideally, you're somewhat technical and can build pages in Webflow yourselfA deep passion for writing and a curiosity about AI's potential to transform the process
BenefitsCompetitive salary and generous stock options100% employer-covered medical, dental, and vision for you and any dependentsDedicated workspace in a beautiful new building in Williamsburg, Brooklyn
Apply todayIf you are a creative, passionate writer and creator who wants to help shape the future of the craft, we'd love to hear from you.
Please send some writing samples and your resume or LinkedIn profile alongside your application.
We look forward to meeting you!

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Writer and Content Lead
output_json.summary: Full-time position in New York City Metropolitan Area seeking a professional writer with a strong background in marketing.
soft_skills: Mentally edits text on various media
Go-to person for friends and family
job_responsibilities: Writing thoughtful blog posts, tutorials, and product updates
Educating users about Type's AI-driven features
benefits: Dedicated workspace in a beautiful new building
output_json.company_information: Building an AI-powered document editor for writers, backed by top VCs, located in Brooklyn, NY.

other.content: 6+ years of experience in content marketing, writing, or a related field; Strong writing and editing skills; Proven ability to create content that drives traffic, engagement, and conversions; Experience with SEO, email marketing, and video production best practices; Experience using publishing and website building tools like Webflow; Deep passion for writing and curiosity about AI's potential.
